email_validation: The :field must be a valid email address.
max_validation: The :field may not be greater than :max.
bool_validation: The :field field must be true or false.
in_validation: The selected :field is invalid. Allowed values: :values.
invalid_json_validation: The JSON body is not valid.
unknown_rule_validation: The validation rule ':rule' is not recognized.
max_value_validation: The :field may not be greater than :max.
alpha_num_validation: The :field may only contain letters and numbers.
alpha_dash_validation: The :field may only contain letters, numbers, dashes, and underscores.
starts_with_validation: The :field must start with one of the following: :values.
ends_with_validation: The :field must end with one of the following: :values.
distinct_validation: The :field field has a duplicate value.
min_items_validation: The :field must have at least :min items.
max_items_validation: The :field may not have more than :max items.
in_array_validation: The :field field does not exist in :other.
date_validation: The :field is not a valid date.
date_format_validation: The :field does not match the format :format.
before_validation: The :field must be a date before :date.
after_validation: The :field must be a date after :date.
mimes_validation: The :field must be a file of type: :values.
max_file_size_validation: The :field may not be greater than :max kilobytes.
min_file_size_validation: The :field must be at least :min kilobytes.
file_required_validation: The :field field must contain at least one file.
invalid_mime_type_validation: The :field field must have a valid MIME type.
invalid_file_type_validation: The :field must be one of the following types: :values.
file_too_large_validation: The :field must not be greater than :max KB. Current size: :current KB.
files_too_large_validation: The :field contains a file that is too large. Maximum size: :max KB. File size: :current KB.
file_too_small_validation: The :field must be at least :min KB. Current size: :current KB.
files_too_small_validation: The :field contains a file that is too small. Minimum size: :min KB. File size: :current KB.
active_url_validation: The :field is not a valid URL.
ip_validation: The :field must be a valid IP address.
ipv4_validation: The :field must be a valid IPv4 address.
ipv6_validation: The :field must be a valid IPv6 address.
uuid_validation: The :field must be a valid UUID.
json_validation: The :field must be a valid JSON string.
phone_validation: The :field must be a valid phone number.
prohibited_if_validation: The :field field is prohibited when :other is :value.
required_if_validation: The :field field is required when :other is :value.
